The BioCatalogue REST API - Changelog

Note: This changelog only applies to the API on the main BioCatalogue site. For latest updates please join the biocatalogue-hackers mailing list or contact us.

We use the Semantic Versioning scheme for our version numbers

v1.1.0b - 25th June 2010

  • Added viewings and favourites counts to the /services/{id} endpoint (in the <summary> section).
  • New endpoint - /soap_services/wsdl_locations. Allows you to get a list of all the WSDL locations of all the SOAP based services in the catalogue.

v1.0.0b - 6th April 2010

  • Initial release of the public API
